name: Pickled
description:
Play as the almighty pickle, and wage war on your fruit and vegetable brothers. Leave mercy for none!

Made for the Alpha @S!F jam I hosted for my students at the end of semester 1 of 2018. All assets were made by me.

Controls

LMB - Fire

RMB - Snap character to camera

WASD - Movement

Q | E - Swap weapons

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Sprint

Left Alt - Orbit Camera

Escape - Pause Menu
